about.title: About Viral
about.subtitle: The AI-powered website creation platform, designed for Africa.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.text: Democratize web creation in Africa by making development tools accessible to everyone, through artificial intelligence.

story.title: Our story
story.text: Viral was born from the desire to simplify website creation for African entrepreneurs, creators and businesses. We believe everyone deserves a professional online presence, without needing technical skills.

values.title: Our values
values.innovationDesc: We push the boundaries of AI to create ever more powerful tools.
values.accessibilityDesc: Technology should be accessible to everyone, everywhere in Africa.
values.qualityDesc: We make no compromises on code and design quality.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.subtitle: Have a question? A suggestion? We're here to help.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Viral, you agree to be bound by these terms of service. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use our service.

services.title: 2. Description of Services
services.content: Viral provides an AI-assisted website creation platform. Our services include code generation, visual editing and website deployment.

accounts.title: 3. User Accounts
accounts.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials and all activities performed under your account.

payment.title: 4. Payment and Billing
payment.content: Subscriptions are billed according to the chosen period (monthly or yearly). Payments are processed securely via Lygos Pay in FCFA.

intellectual.title: 5. Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: You retain all rights to content you create with Viral. However, Viral retains rights to its technology, interface and features.

termination.title: 6. Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account in case of violation of these terms or abuse of the service.

collection.title: 1. Data Collection
collection.content: We collect information you provide during registration and use of our services, including your name, email and payment information.

usage.title: 2. Data Usage
usage.content: Your data is used to provide and improve our services, process payments, communicate with you and ensure platform security.

storage.title: 3. Storage and Security
storage.content: Your data is stored securely and we use protection measures that comply with industry standards.

sharing.title: 4. Data Sharing
sharing.content: We never sell your personal data. We may share data with service providers who help us operate the platform.

rights.title: 5. Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, modify or delete your personal data. Contact us to exercise these rights.

cookies.title: 6. Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve your experience. You can manage your cookie preferences in your browser settings.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.intro: This policy explains how Viral uses cookies and similar technologies.

what.title: What is a cookie?
what.content: A cookie is a small text file stored on your device when you visit a website. It allows the site to remember your actions and preferences.

types.title: Types of cookies used
types.essential: Essential cookies: necessary for site operation
types.analytics: Analytics cookies: help us understand site usage

manage.title: Managing cookies
manage.content: You can configure your browser to refuse cookies. Note that this may affect some site features.
